overview: Ain't It Great to be Crazy? Buster the engineer drives too fast. Jeff tells how steam engines are identified. Old McDonald Had a Train. Jeff explains the different between Standard gauge and O gauge. Classic Ives, Lionel and American Flyer Standard gauge trains are featured Blue Comet, Stephen Girard, State Set, Hiawatha, Mayflower, and the extremely rare White Ives set. A steam engine takes a bath. Many different real steam engines. This Train. How steam engines operate, about a Shay locomotive. Down at the Station. Lionel and AF Barrel Loaders in action. (33 minutes)
title: I Love Toy Trains: Part 5
